channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Walmart’s warning of higher prices puts spotlight on ‘RIM accounting’ practice favored by big retailers
item.description: CFO John David Rainey said RIM accounting will accentuate tariff-induced financial swings.

item.title: UK and EU Strike Brexit Reset Deal
item.description: As leaders gathered in London for a long awaited summit, a senior British minister said his country had secured a new agreement with the bloc.

item.title: U.K. and EU set to reveal new deal—opening up a new chapter after Brexit after ‘late breakthrough’
item.description: EU diplomats said on Monday a deal had been reached on resetting ties with the U.K. after late night talks to resolve differences on key sticking poin...

item.title: Jamie Dimon says he’s not against remote workers—but they ‘will not tell JPMorgan what to do’
item.description: While Jamie Dimon has said there is a time and a place for remote and hybrid work, he says he won't be told by office-resistant staffers how to run JP...

item.title: Israel Announced a New Invasion of Gaza. Is It Bluffing?
item.description: After warning of a major ground operation, Israel has bombarded Gaza but has yet to start a big advance. The threat to do so may be an attempt to forc...

item.title: Trump and Putin Set to Discuss Ukraine War in High-Stakes Call
item.description: A telephone call between the two leaders would be the latest chapter in a flurry of diplomatic maneuvering over ending the three-year conflict.

item.title: How smart CMOs are turning marketing into a launchpad to the corner office
item.description: Today, 37% of Fortune 500 CEOs have marketing experience somewhere along their path to the top.

item.title: Biden’s Cancer Diagnosis, and Why Ukraine is Seeing a Surge of Violence
item.description: Plus, one school district’s big A.I. experiment.

item.title: Trump’s ‘big, beautiful bill’ advances in rare Sunday night vote, but conservatives want more cuts: ‘The bill does not yet meet the moment’
item.description: House Republicans narrowly advanced President Donald Trump's big tax cuts package out of a key committee during a rare Sunday night vote.

item.title: Trump and Putin Set to Discuss Ukraine War in High-Stakes Call
item.description: A telephone call between the two leaders would be the latest chapter in a flurry of diplomatic maneuvering over ending the three-year conflict.

item.title: UK-EU Summit Deal: What to Know as Officials Talk Defense, Trade and More
item.description: Top officials from Britain and the European Union are gathering in London on Monday as they announce a “reset” of post-Brexit relations.

item.title: UK and EU Strike Brexit Reset Deal
item.description: As leaders gathered in London for a long awaited summit, a senior British minister said his country had secured a new agreement with the bloc.

item.title: Will Trump’s Trade War Turn Canada’s Auto-Parts Capital Into a Ghost Town?
item.description: President Trump’s tariffs on auto parts are already causing job losses in Windsor, Ontario, the heart of an industry that makes components for vehicle...

item.title: Tornadoes Reported in Colorado and Kansas as Severe Weather Threat Persists
item.description: Storms capable of producing hail larger than golf balls were expected to persist on Monday. Widespread damage was reported on Sunday.
